abstract: We’re on hiatus, and I still can’t do all of the things I need to do.
snippet: We’re on hiatus, and I still can’t do all of the things I need to do.
lead_paragraph: The restaurant is closed. The hiatus is exhausting. Here I am, with endless commitments, meetings, telephone calls, e-mails. Lists appear on paper plates and backs of envelopes. So many things to do. So many friends left in the lurch in this Facebook world. So many tennis ball cans unopened.
